ezvcard.io.chain

Class ChainingHtmlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ezvcard.io.chain.ChainingHtmlWriter

  • public class ChainingHtmlWriter
extends Object
    Chainer class for writing hCards (HTML-encoded vCards).
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt
    See Also:
    Ezvcard.writeHtml(Collection), Ezvcard.writeHtml(VCard...)
